text: Thomas W Bache (born 1938), is a male former boxer who competed for England. ==Boxing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the -51 Kg division at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. He made his professional debut on 24 March 1960 and fought in six fights until 1963. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:English male boxers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in boxing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Boxers at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people Category:Flyweight boxers
title: Tommy Bache
